title: When will Final Boss Veigar be released :(

replies.body:
When will project Yasuo be released?

Say he's live now again... plz. ^.^
PROJECT: Yasuo is now available! Enjoy!
Is headhunter Caitlyn coming this patch? I didn't see her splash on her champ page in game.
Headhunter Caitlyn is scheduled for 4.15, she's listed as one of the three skins being released this patch!

I saw someone streaming PBE gameplay on the new SR, as the Guardian of the Sands Kha'zix. I don't have Khaz yet, but that skin *really* makes me want him. I don't suppose you could verify if that skin will be in the next patch, or does he have to wait for Azir to release (being egyptian sands themed and all) assuming Azir isn't in 4.16?

I currently have PBE access and I'm pretty sure the k6 skin will be ready by next patch.. unless they decide to completely change the design/particles or upgrade it to a higher tier skin which I see no reason to.

However they could delay it for Azir release (the skin is in relation to Azir's theme so it's probably celebrating his release).. Azir is currently OP atm and has bugs and is able to solo dragon with no damage to him.. needs to be adjusted before release.
